14
15#ifndef ISC_BUFFERLIST_H
16#define ISC_BUFFERLIST_H 1
17
18/*****
19 ***** Module Info
20 *****/
21
22/*! \file isc/bufferlist.h
23 *
24 *
25 *\brief Buffer lists have no synchronization. Clients must ensure exclusive
26 * access.
27 *
28 * \li Reliability:
29 * No anticipated impact.
30
31 * \li Security:
32 * No anticipated impact.
33 *
34 * \li Standards:
35 * None.
36 */
37
38/***
39 *** Imports
40 ***/
41
42#include <isc/lang.h>
43#include <isc/types.h>
44
45ISC_LANG_BEGINDECLS
46
47/***
48 *** Functions
49 ***/
50
51unsigned int
52isc_bufferlist_usedcount(isc_bufferlist_t *bl);
53/*!<
54 * \brief Return the length of the sum of all used regions of all buffers in
55 * the buffer list 'bl'
56 *
57 * Requires:
58 *
59 *\li 'bl' is not NULL.
60 *
61 * Returns:
62 *\li sum of all used regions' lengths.
63 */
64
65unsigned int
66isc_bufferlist_availablecount(isc_bufferlist_t *bl);
67/*!<
68 * \brief Return the length of the sum of all available regions of all buffers in
69 * the buffer list 'bl'
70 *
71 * Requires:
72 *
73 *\li 'bl' is not NULL.
74 *
75 * Returns:
76 *\li sum of all available regions' lengths.
77 */
78
79ISC_LANG_ENDDECLS
80
81#endif /* ISC_BUFFERLIST_H */
82
